entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:42 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 12:42 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
